scripts.pods: (cd ios && bundle install && bundle exec pod install)
scripts.pods:update: (cd ios && bundle install && bundle exec pod update)
scripts.bundle:hostapp:android: react-native webpack-bundle --config config.host-app.mjs --platform android --entry-file src/host/index.js --dev=false --bundle-output build/host-app/android/output-local/index.android.bundle --assets-dest build/host-app/android/output-local/res
scripts.bundle:hostapp:ios: react-native webpack-bundle --config config.host-app.mjs --platform ios --entry-file src/host/index.js --dev=false --bundle-output build/host-app/ios/output-local/main.jsbundle --assets-dest build/host-app/ios/output-local

scripts.bundle:miniapp:ios: react-native webpack-bundle --config config.mini-app.mjs --platform ios --entry-file src/mini/index.js --dev=false --bundle-output build/mini-app/ios/output-local/main.jsbundle --assets-dest build/mini-app/ios/output-local
